text: Gwangjong of Goryeo (Korean: 고려 광종; Hanja: 高麗光宗, 925–975) was a Korean ruler. His real name was Wang So (왕소, 王昭), and his courtesy name was Ilhwa (일화 日華). He was the 4th King and Emperor of the Goryeo Dynasty from 947 to 975. == Other websites == * Gwangjong of Goryeo * Gwangjong De Goryeo * Gwangjong De Goryeo * Gwangjong:Navercast Category:900s births Category:975 deaths Category:Korean monarchs
title: Gwangjong of Goryeo
